background.name: Awful Scab
entries: Prior to the Evisceration of 4707, the district of V'drysha was a lovely borough on the southern edge of Ecanus. Now, it's the Awful, a vast morass of spell-resistant flesh and sinew, ever threatening to engulf the city. You were once a Scab working to push back its influence. It's a nasty, dangerous job, and poorly paid as well, but at least you learned enough to mimic a viscerasuit, the enchanted, airtight suit that protected you from the poisons and plagues of the Awful.
Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Dexterity or Constitution, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in {@skill Medicine} and {@skill lore||Fleshforged Lore}. You also know how to seal your clothing or armor like a viscerasuit. During your daily preparations, you can seal your outfit. The first time each day you are introduced to {@trait poison} or {@trait disease} without taking physical damage, the sealed outfit attempts to {@quickref counteract||3|counteracting} it using your Medicine modifier as the counteract modifier.
